mapper.select: SELECT id, name, enabled, icon, sort, taxRate, IFNULL(CONCAT( '[', GROUP_CONCAT( temp ), ']' ),"") attributionList FROM ( SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.enabled, c.icon, c.sort, c.tax_rate taxRate, CONCAT( '{"type":', a.type, ',"attributes":[', GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT( '{"id":', a.id, ',"name":"', a.NAME, '"}' ) ), "]}" ) temp FROM `pm_goods_category` c LEFT JOIN pm_goods_rel_attribute_category ac ON c.id = ac.goods_category_id LEFT JOIN pm_goods_attribute a ON a.id = ac.goods_attribute_id WHERE if(ac.del_flag is null ,1=1,ac.del_flag = 0) AND c.id = #{id} GROUP BY a.type ) a group by a.id
